TEXT.TITLE: <WESTAR MINING LTD> 4TH QTR LOSS
TEXT.BODY: Shr not given Oper loss 5,900,000 vs profit 9,300,000 Revs 105.3 mln vs 131.2 mln Year Shr not given Oper loss 21.7 mln vs profit 34.7 mln Revs 370.7 mln vs 515.1 mln Note: 67 pct owned by <British Columbia Resources Investment Corp> Note continued: 1986 qtr excludes extraordinary loss of 3.6 mln dlrs versus loss of 294.0 mln dlrs in prior year 1986 year excludes extraordinary loss of 79.1 mln dlrs versus loss 221.5 mln dlrs in prior year Reuter
